text: 23|33|addēhattinṟe janatayil ninn aviśvasiccavaruṁ, paralēākatte kaṇṭumuṭṭunnatine niṣēdhiccu kaḷaññavaruṁ, aihikajīvitattil nāṁ sukhāḍambaraṅṅaḷ nalkiyavarumāya pramāṇimār paṟaññu: ivan niṅṅaḷeppēāleyuḷḷa oru manuṣyan mātramākunnu. niṅṅaḷ tinnunna tarattiluḷḷat tanneyāṇ avan tinnunnat‌. niṅṅaḷ kuṭikkunna tarattiluḷḷat tanneyāṇ avanuṁ kuṭikkunnat‌
